Further advice to a painter, or, Directions to draw the late engagement, Aug. 11th, 1673 Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669.
[2] 6 p.
Printed for R. Vaughan ..., London : 1673.
In verse. Caption title: Another advice to a painter, or, Directions how to draw the late engagement, August 11th 1673. Attributed by Wing to Sir John Denham. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

Printed for R. Vaughan ..., London : 1673.
In verse. Caption title: Another advice to a painter, or, Directions how to draw the late engagement, August 11th 1673. Attributed by Wing to Sir John Denham. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
